title: another casual handwriting font
content:
a quick run through MyFonts What the Font turned up nothing. any clues?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [whatthe.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010214907/http:/typophile.com/files/whatthe.jpg) | 6.89 KB |
author: plainclothes

comments.content:
This is likely to be tough to find, because hand-printed fonts are so easy to make. If it's not a commercial font, or a widely used amateur freebie, you are probably out of luck. [Part 11](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010214907/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script11Pg1.html) of my Script Font ID Guide (Everyday Hand Printing) would be my best shot at showing it, if I have collected it.

- Mike Yanega

<cite>my Script Font ID Guide</cite>

WOW! I hadn't stumbled across that before. nice work!

I suspect this is another free download of questionable (and possibly untraceable) lineage. thanks for trying.
